text.data: Chapter 8 Mid-Air Dragon Battle[end]
Taicho: Up there in the sky is my home town of Mahal!![end]
Matelite: Taicho!! Soon! Soon we will liberate your kingdom of Mahal from the Empire![end]
Taicho: We shall liberate it!![end]
Matelite: Hey, Taicho. Watching the sky is fun!![end]
Several hours pass... How many?[end]
1 hour later 2 hours later 3 hours later[end1]
Taicho: On the other side of the clouds is my home town of Mahal! The smell of the lake has drifted here![end]
Matelite: I see... You know, Taicho, watching the sky is boring.[end]
Matelite: Hey... Hornet, you're our navigator. When will we arrive at Mahal?[end]
Hornet: The sky's become strange. Be quiet![end]
Matelite: It's cold... [character][0x1]! Take over for me![end]
I'll talk with Captain Sendak about the plans for Mahal. It's a conversation for adults, so don't bother us![end]
Taicho: All clear![end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Come down.[end]
Sendak: [character][0x1]... Good work...[end]
Sendak: Here is a gift.[end]
You got Sendak's Sincerity Cookie. Will you eat it?[end]
Thank you, Sendak. I don't need any, you old man![end1]
Sendak: What? [character][0x1]...[end]
Sendak: I am happy...[end]

Sendak: [character][0x1]......
[0x2a]wheeze[0x2a] [0x2a]wheeze[0x2a][end]
Sendak: Eep!![end]
Sendak: [character][0x1]... your rear is so round...[end]
Matelite: Get them before they get to Mahal![end]
Sendak: [character][0x1]... Do you mind if I hold on to you?[end]
Yeah, go ahead. No, please stop, you old man!![end1]
Sendak: [character][0x1]... But I wanted to ride with you...[end]
Sendak: I am so happy...[end]
Taicho: [character][0x1], you keep watch over there!![end]
Taicho: The enemy's dragons have vanished into the clouds!![end]
Taicho: I am watching nothing but the sky!![end]
[character][0x1]: Thank you. Here's a present...[end]
You got [character][0x1]'s Handmade Cookie. Will you eat it?[end]
Thank you!! I'm busy.[end1]
[character][0x1]: Sorry.[end]
[character][0x1]: Well? Is it good?[end]
Delicious! This is fit for a dragon...[end1]
[character][0x1]: I'm glad.[end]
[character][0x1]: Hey, [character][0x1]. Can I keep watch too?[end]
Yes, of course! This is a man's job!![end1]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... I can't see very well. Push me up from behind.[end]
[character][0x1]: The sky... it's such a sad color, don't you think?[end]
Eep!![end]
Hornet: I've never heard that Mahal has stormy skies...[end]
Hornet: The Empire's dragons, huh... Shall we sound the alarm?[end]
Yes No[end1]

Hornet: It looks like the enemy is also headed for Mahal.
Are we ready for attack?[end]
Wait!! Let's go!![end1]

Hornet: My lover is this ship...
Uh... never mind.[end]
All set?! Get on a dragon, everyone!![end]
Okay!! Take good care of the dragons![end]

We can't do anything, but we're supporting you...
Please protect [character][0x1] as best as you can!![end]

Rush: We're going to fight the Empire's dragons!
Get on [character][0x1]?[end]
Feed Ride Not ready[end1]
They're going to attack! Hurry, get on![end]
Truce: Regular staff is over.[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Please, let me ride with you...[end]
Bikkebakke: [character][0x1]!! This way...[end]
Special sale going on!! How can I help you?[end]
Weapons Armor Items[end1]
Be careful and come again![end]
Sendak: We can waste no more time. The Empire's dragons are here.[end]
Taicho: I see something, Matelite![end]
This is bad! In front of [character][0x1]! It's the Empire's Dragon Sky Force![end]

They're reinforcements heading for Mahal!!
What should we do? What should we do?![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! You're supposed to be watching the sky! No leaving your post![end][end]
